name: refnum
description: The primary key for this record

name: location
description: The name of the primary table/view this formula is defined in.

name: location2
description: The name of the secondary table/view (a derived view, a realized table), if appropriate.

name: type
description: The type of the formula/column value/outcome.

name: htmlDoc
description: Pre-rendered html fragment with the full documentation for this formula.

name: referencedColumns
description: The list of columns this formula depends on.

name: created
description: The timestamp for when the record was created. (TILDA.Formula)

name: lastUpdated
description: The timestamp for when the record was last updated. (TILDA.Formula)

name: deleted
description: The timestamp for when the record was deleted. (TILDA.Formula)
